long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an Add On for Salezshark Engage Chrome Extension

What is Salezshark Engage Chrome Extension?

Salezshark Engage Chrome extension offers you the easiest way to get access to the most relevant B2B contact information with just one click. It helps you save all your customer details to your CRM effortlessly without having to interrupt your workflow.
The top sales experts use our services to identify and capture accurate B2B contact details that shorten their sales discovery and help them to close more deals.

How does it Work?

Salezshark Engage Chrome extension helps you to capture leads or contacts as you browse the web. It empowers you to find the email addresses and other contact details behind the websites you're browsing. It also offers you the easiest way to identify and capture your future customers and get their contact details in a few clicks. It helps you to:

•	Identify & Capture leads or contacts from any website you visit 
Create targeted leads lists of contacts that matter to your business simply by clicking the Salezshark Engage chrome extension icon and save the necessary contacts.

•	Integrate seamlessly with your CRM
Once you download the Salezshark Chrome extension, it can be synced with your account, users can add lead or contact details directly to the CRM in few clicks to create a lead or contact and turn the potential prospects into customers.

•	Smart sourcing from LinkedIn
Identify and capture new LinkedIn leads with 100% verified business contact details in a few seconds.

What Information Will You Receive from Salezshark Engage Chrome Extension?

Salezshark Engage makes your content more action-oriented by adding business information, like contact information, designations and company information. 
It empowers you with the capability to contact your leads directly from our Chrome extension by integrating your email account if you choose that option to do so. 


Who Should Get Salezshark Chrome Extension?

Salezshark Engage Chrome extension is meant to be used by all working professionals who have profiles like sales, recruiters, lead generators, head hunters, account managers, marketing experts, 
Business developers and professionals with direct client relationships.
